data.title: Lizbeth Harrison's Profile and Production Credits
data.meta_description: Check out all of Lizbeth Harrison's production credits. Staff Me Up is the #1 site for industry networking and up-to-date credit information.
data.text:
Set up for audio and video press distribution for all journalists, set up audio/video at courtside for radio announcers, set up LED wall along with cameras, sound, lights for pre game and post game interviews with coaches and players. operate cameras, wide shot and manned close up. strike. This was for SEC Women's Basketball in Greenville, SEC Men's Basketball in Nashville, NCAA Men's Basketball in Memphis and NCAA sweet 16 to elite 8 and regional championship in Dallas.

As well as operating a live stream camera on sticks, I Operate wireless cameras capturing close up stories for all of FloSports sporting events from Dancing, Gymnastics, Cheer, Racing, Swimming, Marching, Basketball, Wrestling, Rugby and more.

filmed in Agen France. 9 instructional videos on decorative painting including 7 marbles and 2 faux bois. Designed and set up lighting and sound. Edited 9 videos including the creation of animated logos and title pages.

Capture scenes of 4x4 vehicles moving across rocks, streams, mountains, woods, caverns, and more, all run and gun keeping up with 15 to 20 vehicles and conducting OTF interviews as well. Sound and lighting as needed

operate live feed camera for the underground atlanta performances for the 2016 PeachDrop atlanta. This included filming in front of stage right as well as on the stage for the Ya-Ne performance and Mayor Reed's countdown and celebrations
